review: Chromecast is worthless on iOS. If ALL you care about is watching YouTube and Netflix on your tv then this would be ok. You CANNOT do ANYTHING else on any iOS device (iPhone iPad). No internet. Nothing from your iTunes library. Nothing but YouTube and Netflix. This product is sold as working with any device. That is not really true. It works with your home computer or android device, but is severely limited on iOS. Spend the xtra cash and get Apple TV.

review: The quality of the video streaming is excellent and it does not lag behind at all. The problem I am having is that I cannot stream much at all from this device and think it is a waste of money! I thought I would be able to stream my videos and photos to it and not just videos from netflix and youtube! Not even amazon instant video?!? I am thinking about sending it back because I cannot do much with it! You can do much more with Apple TV so maybe I will head that route!
